summary: Eat food for faster health, stamina and magicka regeneration.
descriptionHtml:
This mod makes food more effective than vanilla skyrim.
This is not hardcore nor survival mod.

[b]Details[/b]
-Cooked foods provide health, stamina or magicka regeneration.

-You cannot eat raw food except apples and tomatos.

-Magnitude of regeneration effect is always 25%.

-Duration of the effect depends on the food's weight; most food effect lasts 30 minutes, but the effect of any foods heavier than 1 lasts 45 minutes. Also there are other exceptions; apples and tomatos' effects last only 15 minutes.

-Meat, cheese and fish dishes provide health regeneration. Fruits and sweets provide magicka regeneration. Vegetables and Breads provide stamina regeneration.

-You can have health, magicka and stamina regeneration effects at the same time. But same effect does not stack. So eating same dishes gives you only 25% regeneration, not 50%.

[b]Requirement[/b]
All Official DLC
author: Ken0Blue
